children.name: category
children.label: Category
children.help_text: You can specify multiple categories separated by commas. Example: apple, orange, pear. Please try using one word with alpha-numeric characters only. You can separate multiple words with "_". Example: inbound_marketing. This is case sensitive, so use the same as in your Listing Menu. Example: you have #iPhone in your Listing Menu, it should be iPhone here, not iphone.
